title: Gowdy defends FBI after Trump's 'Spygate' claim
text:
Gowdy defends FBI after Trump's 'Spygate' claim 2:10pm EDT - 01:33
After receiving a briefing last week with intelligence officials, House Oversight Committee Chairman Trey Gowdy defended the FBI on Wednesday in response to President Donald Trump's unsubstantiated allegation that the agency placed a ''spy'' into his 2016 presidential campaign to help his Democratic rival Hillary Clinton. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
